website_summaries.verdict: Portable snack that's easy for little fingers to grab while on the go.
pros: Resealable container fits in a diaper bag
cons: Could be too sweet for some babies' sensitive tastes

customer_reviews.title: Yummy finger food!
customer_reviews.text: My kid eats these like crazy, we'll often take a 'puff break' in between eating 'real' food just to get back to neutral, especially when trying to distract him from a taste he didn't particularly like. I have watched his hand / finger / eye coordination grow on our homegrown 'puff scale'. They are super tasty, stick well to little hands and are a yum treat for mom and dad as well!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Seter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for introducing finger foods, and good price!
customer_reviews.text: These puffs have been the first finger foods for both of our children. They are fantastic! They dissolve quickly and the flavor is not overpowering for tiny taste buds. Right at first a whole puff seems a bit big, so I break off the edges of the star and introduce them that way. It lets my baby get used to the feel of it on his/her tongue before it dissolves away. I love that this bulk pack saves me about 40 cents per canister when compared with the price at my usual grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Brownie Bites Blog

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper, bland taste
customer_reviews.text: These came quickly and the expiration dates were very far out. I started my son out on Plum Organics super puffs and bought these the next time because they’re significantly cheaper. However, these really have no taste and my 8 month old even prefers the Plum brand. Perfect for learning to pick up small foods though. If you’re budgeting these are fine but taste wise the Plum organics are far superior.
customer_reviews.author: Lash

customer_reviews.title: They are good, not overly sweet
customer_reviews.text: Son started on these at about 6 months old. They are good, not overly sweet, and he LOVES them and will beg for them all the time. He's figured out how to get the lid off with his mouth.
customer_reviews.author: VSkwidd

customer_reviews.title: Product not as shown.
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered the assorted flavor pack, however what I received was only 1 flavor. I’m not too distraught over it as my baby will still eat it, but I will be upset if there was a price difference between a 6 pack of 1 flavor vs a 6 pack of assorted.
customer_reviews.author: lil5weetie

customer_reviews.title: My nine year old loves these. She won't take ...
customer_reviews.text: My nine year old loves these. She won't take them to school for a snack at the risk of being outted for eating "baby food" but when she gets home she's all over them Nam nam nam!
customer_reviews.author: BuyBuyMike

customer_reviews.title: The only puffies you should consider.
customer_reviews.text: Don't even bother trying other brands because this is the only one with it. Also delicious for adults and dogs who help clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Puffs
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the kids in my family and they really enjoy snacking on these when at home or on the go! They're light and fluffy so they are fun to eat- much like little cereal treats. This pack of three is great for some variety- different flavors are all good. The kids are definitely happy with this purchase as well! Great snack to bring to the park or the zoo.
customer_reviews.author: Rosanna W.

customer_reviews.title: Adults Can Enjoy Too
customer_reviews.text: While I could hardly eat 60 in one sitting, these puffs are a delight. All three flavors are very light and very mild, luring hungry people to savor the flavor instead of gobbling them down. These arw great for a light snack when you have an oral fixation to satiate.
customer_reviews.author: EnchantedElle

customer_reviews.title: my 7 month old and toddler also loves these
customer_reviews.text: My soon to be 3 year old decides she likes to eat these now.We really got it for our 7-month old. I'm not big on giving these to her as i'm transitioning to real food. But she does like them, and makes her drink milk more. Regardless -- a few of these, for a smile is worth it
customer_reviews.author: Brian H. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Easy snack
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl loves there. They are a nice thing as a snack but mostly we'll give her a few of these in the morning before breakfast while we get her actual meal together. As a snack...I like that they are not messy like some snacks can tend to be.
customer_reviews.author: Catra121

customer_reviews.title: Our pig loves them!!  Really loves them.
customer_reviews.text: Doug will do any of his tricks for one of these treats! They smell really good but don’t have a lot of flavor that I notice, but I am not the pig. I would assume that babies will probably like these too but I don’t think that their tricks will be as good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, our two year old loves them.
customer_reviews.text: Our youngest daughter loves these. PUFFS may have been her first word. Constantly wants to eat them, these are a great little snack on the go or for long road trips.
customer_reviews.author: CED

customer_reviews.title: Our 9 month old loves these sweet treats and all the great flavors
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly! Our 9 month old loves these sweet treats and all the great flavors. We often even find our 4 year old trying to snag a puff or two as well. It gives me comfort that these puffs melt so quickly in our baby's mouth too.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron M.

customer_reviews.title: Puffs are great for little ones learning how to pick things up ...
customer_reviews.text: Puffs are great for little ones learning how to pick things up and learning to eat. My daughter loves them! Also used as entertainment on the plane. She isn’t a big fan of the blueberry, but loves the other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Alark

customer_reviews.title: So glad i bought them!  Fresh!  Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I bought these. They reminded me why sometimes brand names matter and how the Gerber brand puffs are far superior in flavor, color, taste, and texture than the generic store brand. They were fresh and great! Loved em!
customer_reviews.author: El B

customer_reviews.title: and they loved them.
customer_reviews.text: Very quick shipping. Cant beat the price, strawberry, banana and blueberry 2 of each. I use these as treats for my sugar gliders, and they loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: The baby loved it
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 1 y/o niece. It is amazing how she loved it! It came via her doctor as one of those 'nutritional snacks'. For my surprise, she loves it. Would definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Teles

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than local grocery store
customer_reviews.text: I compared the price to my local grocery store and buying these saved me a little bit of money. I just wish there were more flavors to choose from!
customer_reviews.author: HollyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner finger snack
customer_reviews.text: Great value for these and getting a big pack of them is great, since my toddler loves eating them just as much as my 10 month old!
customer_reviews.author: Smalls

customer_reviews.title: My 10 month old seems to live for these things ...
customer_reviews.text: My 10 month old seems to live for these things. We used them as bribery to get her to crawl. She gets very, very excited when she sees the container. We use them as a special treat.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect snack.
customer_reviews.text: All my four children love it. Specially the blueberry. They start at 6-7 months and the oldest have 11 years old and she is picking from the baby!

customer_reviews.text: My baby loves these puffs! And you won't just need one, you'll need a lot. I carry one in my purse, one in the car & one in his baby bag!

customer_reviews.title: These are great little snacks when they are on sale
customer_reviews.text: These are great little snacks when they are on sale. Perfect for learning to pick up small foods & they melt quickly for beginning chewers.

customer_reviews.text: Blueberry and the strawberry apple taste great, banana not so much. The kiddo doesn't like them either. But I liked having the variety for snacks.

customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the puffs. They came in a small box together that fit easily on the shelf to keep them organized.

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them... at first.
customer_reviews.text: This is always one of the first few foods my kids ever eat, great for new eaters. The kiddos eat them up, like baby candy, but eventually, both of my kids just turn from them. You don't know when it will be. But one day, they will refuse them, and not look back. Even though they'll eat them like crazy in the beginning, don't start buying cases...

product_meta.title: Gerber Graduates Puffs Cereal Snack, Assorted Flavors, 1.48 Ounce, 6 Count
product_meta.description: Gerber Puffs make snacking fun! These little baked snacks are made with whole-grain goodness plus they're so yummy, you might snack on them too! We have a wide variety of flavors to give your baby choices. Gerber Puffs easily stick to little fingers and are perfectly sized for your little one to practice picking things up. Gerber Puffs have 2 grams of whole grains per serving, 5 essential vitamins and minerals and no artificial flavors or artificial sweeteners.
feature_bullets: (Packaging May Vary) Pack of six (6) 1.48 ounce containers of Gerber Puffs
Includes 2 containers of Gerber Puffs Strawberry Apple, 2 containers of Gerber Puffs Banana and 2 containers of Gerber Puffs Blueberry
Melt-in-your-mouth texture specially designed to dissolve quickly
Non-GMO: Not made with genetically engineered ingredients. Star-shaped with ridges, making them easy for little ones to pick up
Gerber is a leader in infant and early childhood nutrition
